exceptions.exn: The LHS of size_belast (size (seq.belast _ _)) does not match any subterm of the goal
In environment T : Type s : seq T Unable to unify "Init.Nat.pred (size s)" with "size (belast s)".

chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Hypotheses:
T: Type
s: seq T

Goal:
size (belast s) = Init.Nat.pred (size s)

Premises:
Notation seq := list
belast = fun (T : Type) (s : seq T) => match s with | [::] => [::] | h :: s0 => seq.belast h s0 end : forall T : Type, seq T -> seq T Argument T is implicit and maximally inserted Argument scopes are [type_scope seq_scope]
Module Nat := Struct Definition t : Set. Definition zero : nat. Definition one : nat. Definition two : nat. Definition succ : nat -> nat. Definition pred : nat -> nat. Definition add : nat -> nat -> nat. Definition double : nat -> nat. Definition mul : nat -> nat -> nat. Definition sub : nat -> nat -> nat. Definition eqb : nat -> nat -> bool. Definition leb : nat -> nat -> bool. Definition ltb : nat -> nat -> bool. Definition compare : nat -> nat -> comparison. Definition max : nat -> nat -> nat. Definition min : nat -> nat -> nat. Definition even : nat -> bool. Definition odd : nat -> bool. Definition pow : nat -> nat -> nat. Definition tail_add : nat -> nat -> nat. Definition tail_addmul : nat -> nat -> nat -> nat. Definition tail_mul : nat -> nat -> nat. Definition of_uint_acc : Decimal.uint -> nat -> nat. Definition of_uint : Decimal.uint -> nat. Definition to_little_uint : nat -> Decimal
Module Init := Struct Definition Unconvertible : forall A : Type, A -> A -> Set. Definition unconvertible : forall (A : Type) (a b : A), Unconvertible A a b -> unit. End 
size = fun T : Type => fix size (s : seq T) : nat := match s with | [::] => 0%nat | _ :: s' => S (size s') end : forall T : Type, seq T -> nat Argument T is implicit and maximally inserted Argument scopes are [type_scope seq_scope]
pred = fun T : Type => T -> bool : Type -> Type Argument scope is [type_scope]
size_behead : forall (T : Type) (s : seq T), size (behead s) = Init.Nat.pred (size s)
size_rem : forall (T : eqtype.Equality.type) (x : eqtype.Equality.sort T) (s : seq_predType T), x \in s -> size (rem (T:=T) x s) = Init.Nat.pred (size s)
size1_zip : forall (S T : Type) (s : seq S) (t : seq T), ssrnat.leq (size s) (size t) -> size (zip s t) = size s
size2_zip : forall (S T : Type) (s : seq S) (t : seq T), ssrnat.leq (size t) (size s) -> size (zip s t) = size t
size_zip : forall (S T : Type) (s : seq S) (t : seq T), size (zip s t) = ssrnat.minn (size s) (size t)
size_allpairs : forall (S T R : Type) (f : S -> T -> R) (s : seq S) (t : seq T), size [seq f x y | x <- s, y <- t] = ssrnat.muln (size s) (size t)
size_take : forall (n0 : nat) (T : Type) (s : seq T), size (take n0 s) = (if ssrnat.leq (S n0) (size s) then n0 else size s)
size_drop : forall (n0 : nat) (T : Type) (s : seq T), size (drop n0 s) = ssrnat.subn (size s) n0
size_takel : forall (n0 : nat) (T : Type) (s : seq T), ssrnat.leq n0 (size s) -> size (take n0 s) = n0
size_ncons : forall (T : Type) (n : nat) (x : T) (s : seq T), size (ncons n x s) = ssrnat.addn n (size s)
size_rcons : forall (T : Type) (s : seq T) (x : T), size (rcons s x) = S (size s)
behead_rev : forall s0 : seq ?T, behead (rev s0) = rev (belast s0) where ?T : [T : Type s : seq T |- Type]
unzip2_belast : forall s0 : seq (?S * ?T), unzip2 (belast s0) = belast (unzip2 s0) where ?S : [T : Type s : seq T |- Type] ?T : [T : Type s : seq T |- Type]
unzip1_belast : forall s0 : seq (?S * ?T), unzip1 (belast s0) = belast (unzip1 s0) where ?S : [T : Type s : seq T |- Type] ?T : [T : Type s : seq T |- Type]
size_set_nth : forall (T : Type) (x0 : T) (s : seq T) (n : nat) (y : T), size (set_nth x0 s n y) = ssrnat.maxn (S n) (size s)
size_cat : forall (T : Type) (s1 s2 : seq T), size (s1 ++ s2) = ssrnat.addn (size s1) (size s2)
rotr = fun (T : Type) (n : nat) (s : seq T) => rot (ssrnat.subn (size s) n) s : forall T : Type, nat -> seq T -> seq T Argument T is implicit and maximally inserted Argument scopes are [type_scope nat_scope seq_scope]
size_rev : forall (T : Type) (s : seq T), size (rev s) = size s
last_nth : forall (T : Type) (x0 x : T) (s : seq T), last x s = nth x0 (x :: s) (size s)
size_reshape : forall (T : Type) (sh : seq nat) (s : seq T), size (reshape sh s) = size sh
index_mem : forall (T : eqtype.Equality.type) (x : eqtype.Equality.sort T) (s : seq (eqtype.Equality.sort T)), ssrnat.leq (S (index x s)) (size s) = (x \in s)
size_rot : forall (n0 : nat) (T : Type) (s : seq T), size (rot n0 s) = size s
size_belast : forall (T : Type) (x : T) (s : seq T), size (seq.belast x s) = size s
size_rotr : forall (n0 : nat) (T : Type) (s : seq T), size (rotr n0 s) = size s
size_mask : forall (T : Type) (m : bitseq) (s : seq T), size m = size s -> size (mask m s) = count (fun x : bool => x) m
all_pred1P : forall (T : eqtype.Equality.type) (x : eqtype.Equality.sort T) (s : seq (eqtype.Equality.sort T)), reflect (s = nseq (size s) x) (all (pred_of_simpl (T:=eqtype.Equality.sort T) (eqtype.pred1 x)) s)
f_equal_pred : forall x y : nat, x = y -> Init.Nat.pred x = Init.Nat.pred y
take_oversize : forall (T : Type) (n : nat) (s : seq T), ssrnat.leq (size s) n -> take n s = s
index_last : forall (T : eqtype.Equality.type) (x : eqtype.Equality.sort T) (s : seq (eqtype.Equality.sort T)), uniq (x :: s) -> index (last x s) (x :: s) = size s
count_predC : forall (T : Type) (a : pred T) (s : seq T), ssrnat.addn (count a s) (count (pred_of_simpl (T:=T) (predC a)) s) = size s
size_pairmap : forall (T1 T2 : Type) (f : T1 -> T1 -> T2) (x : T1) (s : seq T1), size (pairmap f x s) = size s
size_scanl : forall (T1 T2 : Type) (g : T1 -> T2 -> T1) (x : T1) (s : seq T2), size (scanl g x s) = size s
nth_default : forall (T : Type) (x0 : T) (s : seq T) (n : nat), ssrnat.leq (size s) n -> nth x0 s n = x0
subseqP : reflect (exists2 m : seq bool, size m = size ?s2 & ?s1 = mask m ?s2) (subseq ?s1 ?s2) where ?T : [T : Type s : seq T |- eqtype.Equality.type] ?s1 : [T : Type s : seq T |- seq (eqtype.Equality.sort ?T)] ?s2 : [T : Type s : seq T |- seq (eqtype.Equality.sort ?T)]
shape = fun T : Type => map size : forall T : Type, seq (seq T) -> seq nat Argument T is implicit and maximally inserted Argument scopes are [type_scope seq_scope]
seq_ind2 : forall P : seq ?S -> seq ?T -> Type, P [::] [::] -> (forall (x : ?S) (y : ?T) (s0 : seq ?S) (t : seq ?T), size s0 = size t -> P s0 t -> P (x :: s0) (y :: t)) -> forall (s0 : seq ?S) (t : seq ?T), size s0 = size t -> P s0 t where ?S : [T : Type s : seq T |- Type] ?T : [T : Type s : seq T |- Type]
drop_nth : forall (T : Type) (x0 : T) (n : nat) (s : seq T), ssrnat.leq (S n) (size s) -> drop n s = nth x0 s n :: drop (S n) s
pred_Sn : forall n : nat, n = Init.Nat.pred (S n)
pred_of_minus : forall n : nat, Init.Nat.pred n = (n - 1)%nat
SuccNat2Pos.pred_id : forall n : nat, Init.Nat.pred (Pos.to_nat (Pos.of_succ_nat n)) = n
